name: test_low_budget[plutus_v1]
description:
Test minting a token when budget is too low.

        Expect failure.

        * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * try to mint the token using a Plutus script when execution units are set to half
          of the expected values
        * check that the minting failed because the budget was overspent
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token when budget is too low.

    Expect failure.

    * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * try to mint the token using a Plutus script when execution units are set to half
      of the expected values
    * check that the minting failed because the budget was overspent
statusMessage: Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests5/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_mint_raw.py', 1276, 'Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')
